name: Dr. Marcus Soren
role: Leader of The Recursionists - time cult that decoded signal first
core_wound: Was renowned physicist until he discovered proof of bootstrap paradox 10 years ago. Published findings, was academically destroyed. Went underground, built cult around the signal. Now vindicated but broken.
wants: To be the one who closes the loop - to have his role in salvation recognized
needs: To understand that being right doesn't entitle him to control humanity's fate
voice_markers: Prophetic cadence - speaks like preaching gospel
Refers to Elliot as 'The Chosen Variable' or 'Closer of the Loop'
Uses temporal terminology religiously ('We are blessed to live in the final iteration')
Calm certainty that unnerves - never doubts
Quotes himself from his discredited papers
contradiction: Builds cult around temporal determinism while believing individual (Elliot) has agency to close loop. Worships causality while trying to manipulate it.
physical_description: Academic disheveled - tweed jacket, wild gray hair, intense stare. Surrounded by followers who mirror his mannerisms. Temporal equations tattooed on forearms. Carries original Voyager blueprints everywhere.

relationships.Elliot Cross: Obsessed with him as prophesied figure - protective and controlling
relationships.Agent Reyes: Hunted by government, sees her as agent of chaos trying to break loop
relationships.Cassandra Wright: Respects her physics, dismisses her emotional attachment to Elliot as 'temporal noise'
